content.html: I genuinely wonder what techlead’s life is like. It must be a special kind of sad to spend time and energy on using a massive platform to *intentionally* bait engagement with the biggest, most offensive takes.
content.value:
I genuinely wonder what techlead’s life is like.

It must be a special kind of sad to spend time and energy on using a massive platform to *intentionally* bait engagement with the biggest, most offensive takes.
